H0.text: What is the full name of the train robber played by Phil Collins in a 1988 movie. Ronald Biggs

H1.text: What is the full name of the train robber played by Phil Collins in a 1988 movie. Bruce Reynolds

H2.text: What is the full name of the train robber played by Phil Collins in a 1988 movie. Charlie Wilson

H3.text: What is the full name of the train robber played by Phil Collins in a 1988 movie. Buster Edwards

A4.text: Buster, a film about his role in the Great Train Robbery, was made in 1988, with Edwards played by Phil Collins.

A5.text: Edwards was the person responsible for hitting Jack Mills.
